name: pram
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a vehicle for moving a baby around that consists of a small bed supported by a frame on four wheels: I saw her pushing a pram down the street. Synonym
perambulator UK old-fashioned formalCompare
pushchair UK
stroller
